name: Glitch Forest
description:
A glitch garden type game I made to help learn the ins and outs of Unity. The current version has 5 levels with 4 defenders and attackers. As it is a game inspired by Glitch it is a survival game where you must survive ways of enemies until the timer runs out. The difficulty level you choose will effect the amount of health and resources you will have at a beginning of a level  and the attackers will be harder stronger the higher the difficulty level. 

 I do plan on adding to the game in the future (such as levels, enemies,  defenders, and background locations).
